name: Coffee Holding Co., Inc.
description: Coffee Holding Co., Inc. is a prominent player in the coffee industry, specializing in the sourcing, roasting, packaging, and distribution of high-quality coffee products. Founded in 1971 and headquartered in Staten Island, New York, the company has established a robust presence in both the wholesale and retail markets. Coffee Holding offers a diverse range of coffee products, including green coffee beans, roasted coffee, and private label products, catering to a variety of customers, from large retailers to specialty coffee shops. The company is committed to sustainability and ethical sourcing practices, working closely with coffee producers to ensure fair trade and environmentally friendly cultivation methods. Coffee Holding's dedication to quality and innovation sets it apart in a competitive market, as it continually seeks to enhance its product offerings and meet the evolving preferences of coffee consumers. With a strong distribution network and a focus on customer satisfaction, Coffee Holding aims to be a leader in the coffee industry, delivering exceptional products and fostering lasting relationships with its partners and customers.

faq.answer: Andrew Gordon is the CEO of Coffee Holding Co., Inc.

faq.answer: Coffee Holding is headquartered in Staten Island, New York, USA.

faq.answer: Coffee Holding offers green coffee, roasted coffee, and private label products.
